divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my cab near the intersection of Stone Lester in Tucson and noticed abright and white shining star about as bright as Venus would be seen in thedaytime in the north part of the sky about the position Polaris would be and sawit move slowly towards the zenith overhead area and then west before it could nolonger be seen due to thin clouds, lasting about 15 and twinkling like a starthe whole time. P.S. Say Hi to Ken Storch, can you I could not locate my reportfrom Area 51. I will try the Nevada State Tourism Office as I did send it tothem.
